price: 4. Il leur est pourtant parvenu des récits qui devaient les prévenir (de la mécréance),
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum mina al-anbāi mā fīhi muz'dajarun
